BBEX3.A.BTN.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Bhutan / USD 1 = BTN ... (buying) *)

General: *) Only reference rates (mid-market rates) are available for the period from January 2003 to January 2010. The Indian rupee is likewise legal tender alongside the Bhutanese ngultrum (convertible at par).
Source: Since 2011: Bhutan National Bank Limited, Thimphu. 1994 - 2002: Royal Monetary Authority of Bhutan, Thimphu.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
